name: SWOT Analysis - Notion Template
description: SWOT Analysis identifies your organization's Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, and Threats. It directs you to build on your strengths, address your weaknesses, seize new opportunities, and limit risks.SWOT Analysis is a tool that can assist you in analyzing what your organization does well now and developing a successful strategy for the future. SWOT analysis can also reveal aspects of your business that are holding you back or that your competitors could exploit if you don't defend yourself
features: Strengths: characteristics of the business or project that give it an advantage over others; Weaknesses: characteristics that place the business or project at a disadvantage relative to others; Opportunities: elements in the environment that the business or project could exploit to its advantage; Threats: elements in the environment that could cause trouble for the business or project
